text: Destroy Rebuild Until God Shows (also known as D.R.U.G.S.) is an American post-hardcore band. They formed in 2010. D.R.U.G.S released their debut self- titled album on February 22, 2011. It was met with generally positive reviews. AbsolutePunk gave the album a 78%. == Self-titled debut album D.R.U.G.S == On November 11, 2010, Destroy Rebuild Until God Shows released their first song, "If You Think This Song Is About You, It Probably Is."Destroy Rebuild Until God Shows â€“ If You Think This Song Is About You, It Probably IsYouTube On December 6, 2010, they released their second song, "Mr. Owl Ate My Metal Worm." This was followed by "Sex Life", released on January 18, 2011, which is the first single from the album. The album sold 14,000+ copies and peaked at #29 on the Billboard 200. Since then, it has hit #1 on Billboards Hard Rock charts. ===Track listing=== ==References== Category:American rock bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Musical groups from Michigan
